content.detailedDescription:
My son-in-law called me out to the front yard. a bright (very bright_ circular object was coming up from the sw in moved in a straight line for 30-50 miles then took a hard 45-degree left turn (its left) to the north. it then resumed its original course. i am a retired airline captain and i am familiar with fast moving object, i've also witnessed very bright meteors coming into the upper atmosphere. this was like anything. at first we thought it was the iss...Until it changed course. by the time it had passed overhead and was at a 70-80 degree vertical angle to the ne, it appears like it slowed and grew bigger and brighter. it almost appears like it dropped out of orbit into the upper atmosphere - this lasted about 10-15 seconds. then the white glow faded like it was gaining speed and distance from our observation point in california. it finally grew to a pinprick and was red at the center of itself when in finally winked out. it did not fly over the horizon and disappear...It accelerated out of our view on an upward trajectory.

i am a retire airline captain with over 12,500 hours in jet aircraft (i retired at age 38 due to cardiac issues), i have owned and been ceo of my own airline. this is one of the weirdest "ufo's" i've seen.

your servant,
rabbi david miller
luke 24:44-45
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object appeared from sw moving very fast - thought it was iss - byt got brighter and changed course to n - finally faded out and moved ne appeared suborbital and moving 20k mph+

content.detailedDescription:
I turned onto my street and had the funny feeling that i turned onto a different street. houses looked slightly unfamiliar while i thought this. it didn't take long to discover that i was on my street.

then i got out of my car, and looked up. thinking about how clear the sky was tonight and how beautiful the stars looked. i turned around from my car south, still looking up and saw a light.

(two nights before this i had what i believe to be a premonition that i might see a ufo. the last phase of the dream i was on before waking involved a ufo somehow, i was looking at one or something. my recollection of the dream is hazy. i was thinking in the dream, and after i woke, that the time 5:30am kept reoccurring. like i was supposed to remember that time, in fact, my impression was that i should be awake at 5:30am at my house in the living room waiting for the time to go outside and look. i thought this in the morning and several times later in the day when i was actually awake. this i also did not do, i was in a different city and asleep. that 5:30am was the morning of today; the day of the sighting.)

it looked to be the brightness of a plane. slightly brighter. one solid light, no blinking. a little too bright to be a satellite. i looked at it wondering when a second light zig-zagged quickly behind it. it appeared and disappeared in about a seconds time and appeared to be behind the object.

the light turned slightly towards the north-east. i had to move from the middle of my street to the front yard because it went behind a tree. it got brighter significantly, then dimmer, then disappeared. it was still faint enough that you could see it shoot in a line in a slanted direction. i had the impression of seeing several zig-zags that were incredibly faint after this.

it had left a very short time before airplanes began flying east towards its last location. they seemed to behave normally.

i'll mention now that dogs were barking on and off whenever something was visible. in seemingly similar location to where it was in the sky.

the light reappeared slightly dimmer moving like a satellite would with some variation. i would wave to this sort of light and it would brighten accordingly on several occasions. it felt like an acknowledgement, a hello. i heard my neighbors on their porch wondering why i was staring at the sky. i invited them over, the one who walked over, got there in time to miss it. they said, "so you believe in ufos?" only a few seconds too late!

some time after this i began paying attention to what i had already ignored, thinking it to be a plane. it had numerous white lights, some perhaps yellowish, and maybe a red one. after a few seconds of viewing they did turn out to be all-white. blinking in a random sequence quickly and spastically. it bobbed up and down subtly, and disappeared behind the tree line. this was in the ne heading east.

next was the same as the earlier ones, it was fainter, and in more of a straight line path. i thought this one could have been a satellite. i watched, and and it seemed to respond to one of these questions i was thinking when another light blinked behind it (as with the zig-zag earlier). at the time of this blink, the tvs in both mine and my neighbors house flashed. you know what it looks like when a tv goes from a dark scene to a bright one, and you're viewing the light bounce from outside? i'm assuming it was with the tvs and not a surge in the lights of both houses. either way, it happened at the same time as the blink. again i waved hello and it brightened before speeding up and dimming.

i was talking on the phone waiting to see something else (there were several minutes between each incident, at various times), when i turned north to see a low, tree level (but several blocks away i think), object descending! about three solid bright glowing yellow, dark-yellow, yellow-orange lights with a black mass of the object. it seemed to be triangle. it also seemed to turn from on its side to reveal this. it was close! it made no noise, and descended through the trees. i joked on the phone that it was landing, and after it disappeared below the trees in my vision it could have. i worried that it may have crashed, but if it did, it would put it somewhere in residential royal oak. so unless i hear something on the news or the web, i'm assuming it just descended and then faded away that's why i didn't chase after it to try to keep my eye on it, but i still kinda wish i would have. i had a moment of silent prayer for the well-being of the whatever it is or was, on that note. then had a similar feeling as when i first turned on my block, like a profound blink. in the realm of thought, or other dimensions? it was a good feeling, similar ones have occurred in other experiences. after that i had the suspicion that there would be no more activity for now. i hung around outside for a while, but the dogs had stopped barking.

i'm going back outside now for a little while. what a beautiful thing! it's a really great feeling. i feel so blessed and honored to have witnessed these things, and in front of my own house no less, at the exact time that i was outside to notice. wow!


peace
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Zig-zaging lights, brightening, fading, changing direction, reappearing, other sight was spastic blinking, dogs barking when visible, other sight; 3 yellow lights triangle shape descent

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding with my mother on the way to my brother's house.  it was between 4:15 and 4:30.  it was cloudy and oddly that's why i think i noticed the five darker oddly shaped objects in the sky. i told my mother to stop the car and watched them.  the biggest one was hovering at the center of the four smaller objects and the closest thing that i can describe it as is a half moon shape.  this is because it appeared to change slightly in shape.  the four other shapes closely resembled triangles and they moved all about in different patterns around the big center object.  they seemed to "dance and weave" with the most constant pattern reminding me of a dna double helix.  at one point all five seemed to merge before the four smaller ones broke off and did their dance again.  like i said it was cloudy so even though i could definitely make them out, i couldn't notice in detail anything but their shape. in the clouds all five were black shadows against the grey clouds.
i knew right away that these were no ordinary aircraft and that what we were seeing was a ufo.  being a believer but never seeing one i was both very excited and a bit frightened i'm not afraid to admit.  my mother who is not a believer in the slightest was dumbfounded and sat silent as i enthusiastically rambled on about the objects and justification at last to all of those who think we believers are crazy. after about 4 minutes or so, she must have been too freaked out and started driving again even though i protested very loudly and adamantly. as far as i could tell they were still there cause i kept looking until i couldn't see them anymore.  the strangest thing was when we got to my brother's house he and his girlfriend said they saw something similar a few nights back in beckett ma.
i really wish i wrote down exact time and date like a believer should have but sadly i didn't.  i figured i'd never forget the exact time and all but i have.  but i will never forget what i saw.  it was amazing!  luckily (and maybe oddly) a week later after dropping my mom off at work on a cloudy (again)morning i briefly saw what appeared to be another object but this time it was just 1 but looked similar to the bigger object that i saw before. this time it was flying and disappeared in the clouds.  wish i contacted you guys sooner!  any info would be great.  i have just started looking around and researching to see if there were similar sightings especially in my area.  i hope so! feel free to email me.  thanks for your time!
content.summary: Four objects flying around a bigger central object.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on the porch smoking a cig and there is a meteor shower tonight. i heard some airplanes so i looked up a seen this glow light go right over the house and was headed east. so i jumped up and ran out to the yard to see where it was going and at that time it had slowed down and look like it was descending downward toward the ground lower than it was originally going in the first place. once it got past the tree tops i could not see it anymore but as it was going down it started to get duller in color and look a lighter oranges color. so i scanned around to see another one cominging over the trees but not over the house it was due south of house but was going west to east as well. this one was bright a well. was the other but not as white it was already faded the oranges color. i   lost it   behind the trees and got freaked out so i came in the house brought one of kthe dogs with and locked the doors.. i told my husband that if i saw another one i of these things i would contact you guys. i seen some a couple weeks ago as well but not quite the same scenrio. it was above the house but further up and it flashed a bright light brighter than i have ever seen went out looked like a sat light after that drop down a little thhe flashed the bright light again went out again this time it went completly out and shot two sat lights from it one went straight one way one went another and it was gone. what are these thing? why are they over my house?
content.summary: It came over the house silently and flew to east then slowly decended into the hills/tree line. then the second one came through to my west to east and disappeared. i got frightened and went inside. 2 weeks ago i saw something else strange .

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch smoking and all of the sudden this beam of light shot down out of nowhere. then it was gone and when it disappeared it made this womp kinda sound.I kept looking in the sky but i didn't see anything at first.  then i saw something zig zag across the sky.There were a lot of planes in the sky right after that more then what i usually see at one time but they don't shoot down beams of light and disappear with a noise. at first i was excited but then jt kind of made me nervouse. dogs were barking and my cat ran inside the house and wouldn't come back out. its still under the bed right now. i called my mom.
content.summary: beam of light shot down then went away and made a noise and zigzgged

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling west on southeastern ave from 465 . we had just stopped at a stop light at arlington and southeastern ,i was admiring the skyline as the sun was going down on what turned out to be a beautiful day and i saw 5 red/orange objects hovering very close to one another off to the southwest.At first i thought it was the trailings of an airliner or jet. as we drove closer to raymond st. the objects got closer to one another and then they dispersed. at this time, my husband saw 2 of them headed for each other and they passed each other. one of them disappeared and the other seemed to hover right where it was for a couple of minutes.My husband and i did not quite know what to think of what we were seeing.We pointed at it while stopped at emerson and raymond trying to get the motorists attention in the car next to us but he was either looking too or oblivious. we tried to pull over at sherman and raymond to get a glimpse of what we were seeing and the cluster of three disappeared but the other one became invisible right before our eyes. at this time there was a large air liner that seemed to be decending in its flight pattern that was circling the area and then it was out of sight as well. there was deffinately a huge difference between the airliner that we saw and the red/orange objects that appeared to be reflecting light that was actually on the other side of the objects as the sun was setting on the side of the objects that we could not see. there was no contrail that would have me believe that these were mearly airplanes or jets, and there was no noise as you would expect from a plane traveling through the area. we don't quite know what we saw , however it was deffinately un identified.
content.summary: Red/orange hovering, things noted southwest of southeastern and raymond st.

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in the summer of 1983 when i was 16 years old.  i was spending the summer with my grandparents john and shirley olson, who worked for a log home manufacturing company in noel, mo.  they lived on the property as caretakers and grandpa worked in the manufacturing facility as well.  one evening late, i believe that it was mid to late july, i was preparing for bed.  i was staying in a small fifth-wheel tow behind camper which was parked just behind and north of the main office building. across the next lot was a two story log home that the owners had built as a model of what they could offer.  as i lay down i was looking out the window up at the stars a light caught my attention from the top of the hill to the east of where i was.  to my amazement i could see what i will call a ufo as i do not know what it was..  it glided down the hill to the bottom and crossed the road, south kings hwy, and in between the owners model home and the camper where i was.  the owners were away in nacogdoches tx, where they had another branch of their log home business.  i had a full, unobstructed view of the craft for roughly a full minute as it made its way down the hill and past the house and camper.  the object was of a cylinder shape, with a cone on top and flat bottom.  the object glided down in a vertical position just above the trees. the cone was lit up from what i can only describe as the inside and the cylinder was black with lighted stripes going around it vertically at about every 3 to 4 feet.  it was smaller than the house in height and perhaps 20 feet in diameter.  there was no landing gear visible and the bottom was flat and lighted like the cone. the craft hovered silently off of the ground at no more than 4 feet, if that, after it reached the bottom of the hill and crossed the road.  at the top of the hill it was about 1000ft away and at it's closest was less than 100ft in distance.  as it passed i spun in my bed, now facing west to watch the craft go by the manufacturing facility and cross the railroad tracks and out of sight.

sorry, i cannot draw or i would love to include a sketch.
content.summary: Saw hovering craft below tree top level within 100 feet unobstructed view.

content.detailedDescription: On monday october 7th approximatly 8:30 p.M. my brother in law, niece and myself were sitting on lawn chairs in the front yard watching the meteor shower when we spotted a fast moving triangle shaped craft with very dim amber lights heading east of us at a high rate of speed and it made a sharp turn heading south east. the craft seemed to be fairly low in altitude and made no noise at all. at about 8:45 p.M. my wife, brother in law and myself witnessed a smaller craft going the same exact path as the first sighting. this craft had no lights and made no noise.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
Three persons saw a disk shaped flying object fly in the clear moonless sky.
the witnesses were a man, his wife and his step-daughter.  that man first saw the object's side view which looked like a rectangle flying in the west.
as he continued to watch it, it got closer to him in an eastward direction.
he realized that it was round, dark and rust orange in color.  he later went inside his apartment.  that apartment where he lived and saw that object was his previous home.  he grabbed a video camera and made a video of that flying object.  that man shouted, "there is a flying saucer outside!"
his wife and step-daughter came to see that flying object.  that ufo came closer at about 2200 feet.  his wife noticed that the ufo  had what looked like modular markings at the edges of it.  the ufo flew directly above their heads as they watched it outside next to their home.  it was straight up going east.  later it went south at 70 kilometers per hour.  then its speed greatly increased and decreased.
content.summary: Three witnesses, a man, his wife and his step-daughter, saw a disk shaped flying object  going west, east and south increasing speed, they were excited.

content.detailedDescription: For the past 3 weeks i have had something killing my barbado sheep. the sex origins have been removed. this morning i found one bardado sheep dead with it origins removed and buzzards had started to stripe it and other one missing.
content.summary: This moringi i went out to check on my barbado sheep and found one dead and one missing.

content.detailedDescription: Going to work at 2am and i see 2 bright red orbs to the left of me high in the sky. one orb was higher then the other but they were pretty close together. the lower orb on the right side i noticed had a little bit of a white light.  being near the airport i know what aircraft lights look like and that the air traffic controller wouldnt let 2 commercial aircraft get that close a few miles from the airport. to be certain i opened up my flight radar app on my phone while driving to check knwon commerical flights around the airport and there was none. i wanted to pull over to shoot a video or take a pic but i was running late for work. for the 30 seconds i was in view of them they didnt flash or move or make noise.
content.summary: 2 bright red orbs over burlington

content.detailedDescription:
At around 9:10 pm earlier tonight i was on break outside at work.  i was joking around and looked at the sky.  at first i saw a large slow moving aircraft with bright lights that was being followed by smaller craft, these craft were aircraft as you could hear the sound of the engines as they flew over.  this area has a lot of air traffic, the military flies f-15s at regular intervals, at times, multiple times during the week.  to the north lies blacksburg, va which has a small airport, this airport has various craft from cesnas, twin turboprop beechcraft and can accomendate for citations and leer jets.  forty miles away is a regional airport located in roanoke, va, the craft that operate out of the airport are large commuter planes.
thinking nothing of the large craft overhead as i have seen aircraft at night like that before, i looked to the south and joked if i would see something.  a couple of co-workers have said that they have seen something in the night sky previously the week before last.  
i observed on the horizon a glowing red object, as i watched the object hovered, moved slowly back and forth, then jutted back at an extreme speed.  the object continued to hover slowly changing directions, at this time the objected stopped and moved revealing a second object that went in the opposite direction.
as i watched i tried to call attention to a co worker who was taking break outside with me, asking him to look at what i was watching.  my coworker said,"yeah, yeah, it's a helicopter", there was no sound though.  the slow moving aircraft i saw had sound.  i was becoming excited and after a few minutes wrote down notes of what i saw and how it behaved.  
the sighting lasted for approximately ten minutes and ended as the objects left slowly and disappeared over the horizon.

i am including a scan of my notes image from google maps of the break area and hill that the object was witnessed and also a short 3d animation of the object as best as i can recreate while my memory is fresh
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was out on break and looked at sky as i do often and saw object hovering and moving

content.detailedDescription: 2 objects in sky appeared as lights from a plane or star but changed colors & lights swirled.  located in el dorado county looking east.  many different colors or white lights and back to swirling colors in many shapes around and within these starry like objects.  the colors and movements could only be seen while using binoculars.
content.summary: 2 objects in sky appeared as lights from a plane or star but changed colors & lights swirled

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was at my house taking my dog out. 
2. what made you first notice the object? it was glowing very bright. 
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? first thought it was an airplane from barksdale airforce base but then realized it was hovering soundless and bright
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. it was hovering and emitting bright blue white reddish orange lights. hasn't moved in 2 hours and is still active as of the time writing this which is 3:15 am ct
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. i was completely fine. coherent and aware but was confused at what i am seeing. 
6. how did you lose sight of the object? i didn't it's still there.
content.summary: 2nd time in 2 days. pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright red light on my way home from ork.I pulled over an ot out to see and it was moving west.I pulled over cause i didn't see any plane lights.Another cat pulleid over and saw the light too. we even saw a plane fly right in the same horizon
 ,and that's when i can tell it was way higher then the plane. it started then to slowly loose light and faded away.

  now i'm not one with social media,  i don't do this really at all.I just can't figure this out. i'm hoping more people saw this that night and hoping if more this site can help. red dot in sky i youtubed and its exactly what i saw.
content.summary: Saw a bright  fireball in sky that moved

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard
it was fast 
not an airplane
flew fast then stopped
i want inside my house to get a camera
sped away after a few seconds
content.summary: Flying object flying at high speed, then stops, then fly away

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were driving on east on i-80 just west, outside of truckee. it was very dark around 9pm and there was no other traffic. in front of us, about 100 feet, this amazingly large dark object with yellow lights was just above tree line and was crossing over the road. it traveled from south to north at just above tree level. the size was enormous. my daughter asked me what it was and i've never seen anything like it so i had no answer. it made no noticeable noise for its size and did no damage to the trees. it disappeared into the tree line. 
it all happened so fast and we were both so shocked we did not get a picture.
content.summary: It was a very large, dark long square block shape with yellow lights that passes across the interstate. it had yellowish lights. never seen anything like it.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed while taking out trash around 9:30. object appeared to be a single bright, white light. no physical structure to be apparent. appeared to be lower than the cloud line because the clouds seemed to reflect the light from the object, as if the light source was below cloud cover. object disappeared sometime after sighting. 

**note** object reappeared following night, 10/07/13 alongside a much larger sized, circular object which i mistook for the moon at first. accompanying object appeared to be non luminous itself but seemed to reflect the light from the sports arena at siu.
content.summary: Bright white light disappeared reappeared 10/07/13

content.detailedDescription:
The date is approximate it was near the date of the meteor shower. until recently i have tried to forget about most of what i have seen over the years.  however, a day or so afterward, i decided to document this one. 
as i was sky watching for meteors i saw a light very high in the sky.  i watched the light come from the east. it was a white light not blinking or anything else.  it appeared to be on the edge of the atmosphere, either inside the atmosphere or just outside. similar to seeing a satellite flying above only much faster.  as i watched it fly across the sky, i saw it turning to the south until i could not see it anymore.  this did not take long from beginning to end.  i have seen satellites before and they do not go through the sky quite that fast. i have seen the space station go through up in the sky and it does not go that fast. satellites, the space station or meteors do not change direction. not sure what it was but it did not seem like anything i have seen before, nor something we have.  i believe the aircraft we have here on earth are required to have a beacon light.  i did not see anything like that on this craft.  i did not have a camera with me.  even if i did i do not think it could have caught the low grade light from the object.  ironically, i had two new marks on my wrist and knee that were all approximately 1/4 inch long and newly scabbed over.  not a deep cut with a heavy scab buy i could feel them when i rubbed my fingers over them.  i can still see the marks on my wrist and knee. the marks on my wrist are approximately 1 1/2 inches apart, and the marks on my knee are approximately 3 inches apart.  i did not scratch myself in these areas.  if it were one point instead of 4 points so similar in size and shape i would not think it was strange.  i took a photo of these a couple of days after i noticed the marks.  i also would think less of these if it were not for the fact i have other scars on my body that have no reason for being there. i have never broken a bone and yet i have a scar on my forearm and on the top of my foot.  i have had strange bruising in the past (at the time i just shrugged off) of four dime size bruises on my upper arm.  all similar in size and spacing. similar to someone pressing my arm with fingertips hard enough to bruise. i have a scar on my left hand between my thumb and forefinger and can feel some sort of object deep under the skin in that area.  
i have no idea if i was ever abducted, and no reason to think i had been, but these are strange coincidences.
content.summary: High in the atmosphere or above a light flew from the east then turning to the south

content.detailedDescription: 1.. i was doing a load of laundry (which is outside in my garage) walking back inside i looked up and saw this thing in the ski.  2..The reason i looked up in this area is because about 1-2 months earlier i saw this same thing or lite behaving the same way moving very slowly in the ski (same direction),only the first sighting the time was about 1 or so a.M. in the morning. this second sighting the time was about 7:30 pm. or so. when i first noticed it, it wasn't quit all the way dark out yet and you could see something in the ski(not a lite, just an object) by the time i got my phone and started taping, it was getting dark and you can see this lite. the only thing i can think what it was that makes any sense is maybe some gps plane (because i saw it twice in same area behaving the same way) or a ufo. as you can see in the video, its moving very slow. i also have a picture that i took from my droid phone (that is not active in service, i just use it for pics and video) from the time i first saw it, i got in my truck and drove down the street to get a better look at it because the tree tops were blocking it alittle. i pulled in a parking lot and took a pic of it, and a small video. then i drove about 3-4 blocks or so to get a better look at it and that's when i shot the video. you can see the moon next to it in the video. after taking video of it, i left and got something to eat at bk. i drove across the bridge to go back home and i looked up and it was still up there in the ski at around 8:00 pm. in the same area. when i pulled in my driveway back home, looked up and it was gone. i don't know if the pic and videos got uploaded or downloaded (whichever is correct)to this site or not, but i have them on my phone and on my computer. if they didn't, i can try to email them to you. i was able to upload them from my phone to my computer.
content.summary: Saw this lite twice same area about 1 or 2 months apart

content.detailedDescription: Me and my two daughters were walking our dog on a early evening weekday, jessica bent down to tie her shoe, after she finished she said "dad what that and was pointing up to the northern part of the sky (right ahead of us) at the time she said that i was talking to my other daughter and holding the leash to the dog, so we all 3 looked to where she was pointing and was amazed at what we was looking at, it looked like a small moon that was beyond the color red-orange! it looked like it was on fire, and the intensity of that color was something i never seen before and haven't yet, so, as we stand in silence and watch this thing it's just sitting in the sky, (i'de say about 19-25 feet above our heads) not moving at all. i had goodsebumps and a feeling of not knowing whats gonna happen, but i felt fear and i know my 2 daughters were feeling that fear too, you could just feel it. so after about 55 seconds the object finally moves a little upwards and starts heading west very slowly, so we started to walk fast to see were it was going it picked a little speed and was gone through the tree lines, we were shocked. jessica says "dad what was that?" i said what do you think it was and she looked at me and said a ufo and i smiled at her
content.summary: Big ball of fire being driven intelligently seen in sky

content.detailedDescription:
S the yellow began the red dimmed slightly and i caught sight of the surface 
of the sphere, it appeared to be gaseous in nature and roiling and seething.
     at this time i couldn't tilt my 83 yr. old neck back any further and i lost sight of it for a split second , when i saw it again i could no longer see any detail behind the glare and they were receding rapidly toward the nw
 when they disappeared.
     in the past i have held a private pilots license and followed the hobby of amateur astronomy,and ever since the roswell incident i have been hoping to witness something as described above, finally!!!
      the whole incident took approx.32 seconds from horizon to horizon and without knowing the actual size of the objects it's impossible to pin down 
their distance and speed . i loaded a f86 sabre into my flight simulator
and flew over a control tower where i could observe the flyby from the ground, i flew at 400 knots and 1000', the angular velocity was similar to
that of the ufos.
     i hope this helps.
content.summary: Two objects appeared approx.15deg. above thesw horizon then flew almost overhead to the ne horiz.  then dissappeared appox. 15 deg.

content.detailedDescription: One the last night of moving big furniture into a new home, me and my daughter took a little break on the front porch, my wife was in the bathroom, me and my daughter was talking about the new home when out of our left side of vision we see this moon shaped object, same color,but brighter, (about half of a half the size of the real moon i'd guestimate) we watch as this object "play danced " very low in the sky, by our vision it looked about around the height as the power lines, so its flyin,then it dead stops, dissapearing, reapears, dissapearing, reapears , and starts dancing again, it does that for about 15-20 sec and stops, dissapears and never reapears again. we didn't say a word for a couple of minutes, and while this is goin, my wife was in the bathroom, missed the whole thing, but me and my 7yr old daughter seen the whole thing!
content.summary: Half moon  shape behaving oddly

content.detailedDescription:
Left the dog out and decided to look for meteors when i saw a bright light, like a helicopter or airplane with landing lights on. it was moving south to north, the light went dim and it kept moving getting smaller and higher. it was moving quicker than i usually see satellites passing. i first thought it was an airplane but had no flashing lights and there is no airport in that direction. i then thought it may be the iss but i've seen that and the light is constant and does not travel in that direction. the fact that it moved fairly quickly and got dimmer and smaller unlike a satellite got my attention. it was a very clear low humidity evening, cloudless.
  it got out of sight much sooner that i have seen satellites and it got smaller and dimmer leaving me to believe that it was traveling away quickly. it did not act at all like an airplane or helicopter. there is a satellite that travels almost directly overhead about 9:10pm every night.This makes a good reference for speed and visibility.
content.summary: Bright light then dim moving and getting smaller and dimmer

content.detailedDescription:
1. was in the hot tub.
2.My son pointed at it and i notcied the lights.
3. i didnt know what it was, never seen anything like it. so i assumed i was witnessing a ufo.
4. it flew in a steady line at a steady speed. was a circular shape and was orange with tints of red lights. as it was moving it ascended higher into the air and disappeared into the sky. then came back. did this twice and i lost sight of it after that.
5. i was in awe. i couldnt belive what i just seen. i wanted to see it again and i kept searching for it in the sky. was excited and amazed.
6. it disappeared into the sky as it went over an apartment bulding.
content.summary: Bright orange circular object flying straight above me. disappeared into sky then reappared. was going in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the beach with my boyfriend watching the sunset. i took about 6 pictures of the sun setting and the clouds with my phone. when i looked at the photos later i noticed this glowing sphere. i did not see this with my naked eye....The sun was very bright as it set. this does not look like a sun glare to me because it seems to move in a clockwise circular manner. if you look at the photos in order and use the cloud formations as a reference piont......You can see that it moves. 
also in the first and last photo there is a reddish aura around the glowing sphere. all i have are the photos....Again i saw and heard nothing with my eyes. not sure what this is?
content.summary: Ufo sphere in the sunset?

content.detailedDescription: Clear windless night, approx. 35 miles from portland oregon,(nw). outside on my back deck and saw what first appeared to be a fireball low in the sky. however upon closer observation, the object was not a fireball as it was traveling in a horizontal path. bright orange triangle shaped object with very bright color. observed object for approx. 1-2 minutes. i called my neighbor to see if they had seen it, and as we were talking, another similiar object flew over in the same path. neighbor's observed the same thing. bright orange triangular object traveling in the same direction. as we talked about the direction, i went out my front door, and saw the third set of exactly the same thing in the sky heading again from sw to ne. neighbors also went into their front yard and followed it. the third object traveled in the same path but lights went out at about the 1:00 position on a clock, after it passed over the neighbors house on the north side, this time much closer. objects were all silent. a small commuter type jet flew approx 2 miles east following the columbia river, but much higher at the same time, so that pilot should have seen the second object as it was directly in front of him, although lower in elevation.
content.summary: 3 sets of orange lights, traveling from sw to ne. approx 3 minutes apart, same direction/path

content.detailedDescription: Like fire ball- (like an airplane in fire) without any sound, very fast
content.summary: Like fire ball- (like an airplane in fire) without any sound, very fast

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out in my front yard observing the moving stars in the sky as usual for about an hour or so win this round dark dull gray object swooped down and vanished at first i was kinda shocked thin i seen it 2 or 3 more times about this time it was around 2:10 but each time i seen it was for just a few seconds but it looked like it was in front of my face well i changed location on top of a hill in my front yard after i was admiring the strange moving stars as usual win the dull gray object became more visual this time but it appeared much smaller this time and i was facing a different direction in the sky i watched it looked like it was glitching threw the night sky thin it was gone..I have witnessed multiple encounters of strange objects in osgood on multiple occasions i dont under stand how people dont believe something strange is going on in the sky's at night and thin again those people probably never actually pay to much attention or as opened minded as to what is rill happening out in our souler system planes dont just stop in mid flight and vanish.. i mean if we have invited some new technology i would love to be enlighten but in till that happens i will keep looking for unexplained encounters on what i seen and the strange stars that i allows see at night...
content.summary: Dull gray object dipe down and disipeard and i seen it about 4 or five more times with in a few hours

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend are outside his porch when i decide to look up at the sky. i noticed an object or possible light moving at multiple directions. at first i blew it off as some kind of circus light...But it continued to appear and disappear..At that point i told my friend to look into the sky to verify what i see. once he did he verified he also saw the circular object moving at tremendous speed and multiple directions. once he acknowledged to me that he also sees the ufo he decides not to look back in fear...I told him he had to look and at that point i started to take pictures with my cell phone..Soon after the object never reappeared. during this sighting the object seemed to have the ability to almost look blurry. like it was spinning so fast that it looked blurry..I have at least one good photo showing the object moving at a high rate of speed it left a trail. looking at the object put a strain on my vision. i had to look at other stars to make sure my vision was ok...Please reply back so that i will be able to down load this picture..I need help from my son
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo appeared to look blurry in the sky but all the stars looked perfectly visible
